trans-unit.source: Controls the strictness of the code generated by the common language runtime's just-in-time (JIT) compiler.
Apply the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute> attribute to assemblies to specify assembly compilation parameters.
Use the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxations> enumeration to specify compilation options.
This attribute is ignored in version 1.0 of the Microsoft .NET Framework.
The classes in <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices> are for compiler writers' use only.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute"></xref> class with the specified compilation relaxations.
Apply the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute> attribute to assemblies to specify assembly compilation parameters.
This attribute is ignored in version 1.0 of the Microsoft .NET Framework.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxations"></xref> value.
Apply the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute> attribute to assemblies to specify assembly compilation parameters.
This attribute is ignored in version 1.0 of the Microsoft .NET Framework.
Gets the compilation relaxations specified when the current object was constructed.
The compilation relaxations specified when the current object was constructed.

Use the <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxations"></xref> enumeration with the <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxationsAttribute.CompilationRelaxations"></xref> property.
